message.name: ERR_APPLICATION_ALREADY_EXISTS_CANNOT_CREATE
message.locale: An application configuration with an ID of %1s already exists. Please specify a different ID.

message.name: ERR_APPLICATION_CONFIGURATION_ISSUE
message.locale: The application configuration with ID %1s contains an error.

message.name: ERR_SECTION_EXISTS_FOR_APPLICATION
message.locale: The application configuration with ID %1s already contains a reference to the %2s section. Please select a different section.

message.name: ERR_PREFERENCES_NOT_POPULATED
message.locale: Preferences Title must be populated if preferences is selected.

message.name: ERR_HELP_NOT_POPULATED
message.locale: Help Title must be populated if help is selected.

message.name: ERR_LOGOUT_NOT_POPULATED
message.locale: Logout Title must be populated if logout is selected.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_DELETE_SEARCH_PAGE
message.locale: Cannot delete search page with page ID of %1s as the Application Search must have at least one search page.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_DELETE_DEFAULT_SEARCH_PAGE
message.locale: This search page cannot be deleted as it is the default search page.

message.name: ERR_SEARCH_PAGE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The search page with a page ID of '%1s' already exists. Please specify a different page ID.

message.name: ERR_MUST_SPECIFY_DIFFERENT_SEARCH_PAGE_TYPE
message.locale: A search page with a type of %1s already exists. Please specify a unique type for this search page.

message.name: ERR_MUST_NOT_CONTAIN_SPACES
message.locale: The Page ID field must not contain spaces.

message.name: ERR_MUST_SPECIFY_CUSTOM_APPLICATION_LOGO
message.locale: The Custom Logo field is required where Logo Status is set to Custom.

message.name: ERR_MUST_SPECIFY_SMART_NAVIGATOR_DEFAULT_SEARCH_PAGE
message.locale: There is no other search page defined. Please specify a search page before disabling the Smart Navigator.

message.name: ERR_MUST_DEFINE_PAGE_ID
message.locale: Further Options Description defined. Please specify the further options Page ID.
